content: furry polar bear free crochet pattern by @leta toyfox the free amigurumi pattern is copyright resale copy-paste etc are prohibited your reporting on violations is highly appreciated when publishing your work please indicate the author of the pattern @leta toyfox please contact me contact me in any convenient way if you have any questions suggestions about the pattern i m always happy to help and i ll be glad to get any feedback from you have a nice crocheting difficulty level medium this pattern requires experience in crocheting of furry yarn materials and tools 1 yarn recommended alize softy 100% mikropolyester 115m*50g 128yds*1 76oz in colors white #55 col a 1ball beige #310 col b small amount 2 stuffing 3 one pair of safety eyes 10mm 4 safety nose 12mm 5 hook size 2mm us 4 6 yarn for embroidery in black and brown colors 7 needle for sewing scissors pins markers tapestry needle 8 plastic joints d=10-15mm 4 pins for legs attaching d=35-40mm 1pin for head attaching abbreviations yo yarn over magic_ring magic_ring round/rnds round/rounds st/sts stitch/stitches single_crochet - single_crochet stitch increase increase 2sc in one stitch decrease decrease single_crochet 2 together chain - chain stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch parentheses are used for repeated patterns of stitches example 2sc 1inc *3 means repeat 3 times 2 single_crochet and one increase used for making patterns of stitches in one stitch example 2sc 1dc means make 2sc and 1dc in one stitch size 20cm 8 for recommended materials this pattern does not contain tutorials for crocheting toyfoxstore etsy com 2 pattern tips all blue links are clickable video tutorial how to crochet polar bear https //youtu be/x3geuie9pd4 how to crochet of furry yarn https //youtu be/vazvzscgkt0 color change to get a nice color change work last single_crochet in current color as follows insert hook in last st pull up a loop make yo with the new color and pull it through all sts on hook continue with the new color please watch the video at link to find out how to get a nice color change how to close the hole close the hole using a tapestry needle when closing the hole use only the front loops and move around the circle from stitch to stitch until the hole closes nicely please watch the video at link to find out how to close the hole toyfoxstore etsy com 3 hind legs make 2 worked in the round from bottom up start with col a stuff as you go please watch video tutorial at link https //youtu be/x3geuie9pd4 t=1m09s round 1 6ch from the 2nd st from hook 4sc 3sc in last st 12 turn and work on the other side of the foundation chains 3sc 1inc round 2 2inc 2sc 4inc 2sc 2inc 20 round 3 1sc 1inc 4sc 1sc 1inc *3 4sc 1sc 1inc *2 26 round 4-5 26sc * 2rnds 26 work 1sc and move stitch marker this is new round beginning round 6 8sc 2dec 2sc 2dec 8sc
